name: Just Dice Bot 2015 Extreme
short_description:

Just sign in to the site with bot, make sure the "Extreme bets" option is checked and start rolling!

This is more than one-year of hard work, we are happy if it can help people to promote the use of Clams currency!

Never heard of Just-Dice.com?!

summary: Just-Dice Bot to make free Clam coins from Just-Dice.com
